endpoints.description: Retrieve summarized market trends categorized by major global regions.
Access analytics of automobile sales including growth trends and comparison metrics.
Submit new data regarding consumer automobile preferences for analysis and storage.
Obtain a list of emerging technologies influencing the automotive sector.
View regional economic indicators related to automobile market shifts.
Retrieve historical sales data for specific automobile categories or regions.
Request predictive analytics on future automobile sales based on provided parameters.
Access detailed market share metrics for different automobile segments.
List the top automobile distribution networks sorted by sales figures.
Explore trends in consumer behavior and preferences towards automotive purchases.
